column4: I had ubuntu running on a Compaq TC1100, and when I rotate the screen the stylus doesn't work right. It still acts like its in landscape mode. How can I fix this?
is it a wacom tablet (the screen)?
if so i think you can use xsetwacom to rotate the input device
i used to do this with an old toshiba convertible laptop/tablet thing. use xrandr and xsetwacom to rotate the display and the tablet
